column4: can people throw out some names of some easy to use, easy to install LAMP wiki software? or other pointers? not really sure where to begin (I do already know LAMP however)
the easiest is prob TiddlyWiki (1 file) and not really LAMP. mediawiki is prob most popular ... there are truly a wide variety though i think wikipedia has a comparison page
Yes, maybe check here for a high-level comparison: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_wiki_software
